channel.title: Timeleft command
channel.description: does anyone know how to a command to make to see how much minutes are left until the sever restart becasue people be getting mad and they wanna know i use the auto restarter.exe can anyone tell me how to make the command for it please? :confused:

item.title: Timeleft command
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

if you find a tut can you give me the links thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Timeleft command
item.dc:creator: @cafoozle cafoozle
item.description:
@cafoozle wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:5, topic:337817”][quote author=cafoozle link=topic=434219.msg3188557#msg3188557 date=1272010494]
if (command.startsWith(“update”) && (command.length() > 7)
&& (playerRights > 2)) {
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
.substring(7)) + 1);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
[/quote]that’s to show how long until a system update, idiot.[/quote]

Rofl. My bad. I thought he ment update. Miss read. Well the restart. I couldn’t help you on that one. sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Timeleft command
item.dc:creator: @cafoozle cafoozle
item.description:
@cafoozle wrote:

		if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)
				&& (playerRights > 2)) {
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
					.substring(7)) + 1);
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}
